description: A standard factory-made banjo.  Looks to be in working condition.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your banjo.
You play a bluegrass tune on your banjo.
You play a quick, Southern ditty on your banjo.

description: A polished bone flute with five finger holes.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your flute.
You play a beautiful piece on your flute.
You play a piece on your bone flute that resembles the howling wind through Aurignacian caves.
Your bone flute wails for the fallen during the hunt.

description: An ornate clarinet made from wood.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your clarinet.
You play a moving, orchestral piece on your clarinet.
You play an uplifting marching tune on your clarinet.

//: Moved this to just being silver.  Flutes aren't made of iron, and a full size sterling silver flute weighs 440g, which is the existing weight.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your flute.
You play a beautiful piece on your flute.
You play a piece on your flute that sounds harmonious with nature.

description: A brass trumpet with only a few dents here and there.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your trumpet.
You play a slow, mourning piece on your trumpet.
You play a little ballad on your trumpet.

description: A small factory-made ukulele.  Makes you wish you were on a tropical island, or somewhere over the rainbow.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your ukulele.
You play a cute little ditty on your ukulele.
You play a small jam on your ukulele.

description: A cheap, factory-made violin with a built-in holder for a bow.  Still produces a nice sound.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your violin.
You play a beautiful orchestral piece on your violin.
You play a quick, southern ditty on your fiddle.

description: A shiny golden fiddle, with a strange aura around it.  You feel like it once belonged to the best there's ever been.

player_descriptions: You play a quick, folksy tune on your fiddle.
As you pull the bow across its strings, it makes an evil hiss.
You play a tune so fierce, it feels like hell's broke loose.

description: A shiny golden krar, similar to a harp.

player_descriptions: You play a relaxed, folksy tune on your krar.
You produce a happy tune on the harmonica.
You whistle on the harmonica.
npc_descriptions: produce a happy tune on the harmonica.

description: A harmonica with a holder, so that you can play it without a free hand.

player_descriptions: You strum a few chords on the guitar.
You pluck a few notes on the guitar.
You play a slow blues-y tune on the guitar.
npc_descriptions: strum a few chords on the guitar.
pluck a few notes on the guitar.
play a slow blues-y tune on the guitar.

description: A simple wooden acoustic guitar with a strap so you can wear it around, even when not playing.

player_descriptions: You plink out a shredding solo on your guitar.
You play an epic classic rock riff on your guitar.
You play a furious, muted riff on your guitar.
You play a crunchy stoner tune on your guitar.
You play an old Britpop song on your guitar.
You play a tasteful classical piece on your guitar.
You play a jangly folk ditty on your guitar.
You play a melancholy melody on your guitar.

description: A standard factory-made electric guitar.  It's probably better at smashing heads than melting faces, these days.  Has a strap.
//: Electric guitar less awesome when there's no electricity.  So I made it much quieter and less fun to play.

player_descriptions: Your pipes drone loudly as you strikes a battle hymn from the chanter.
Your pipes drone a slow and piercing dirge.
You strike a lively quick step march on your pipes.
npc_descriptions: pipes drone loudly as it strikes a battle hymn from the chanter.
pipes drone a slow and piercing dirge.
strike a lively quick step march on their pipes.

description: A traditional musical instrument, using enclosed reeds fed from a reservoir of air contained within a leather bag.  It has a strap so you can wear it around, even when not playing.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on the tuba.
You play a ditty on the tuba.
You play a marching tune on the tuba.
npc_descriptions: play a little tune on the tuba.
play a ditty on the tuba.
play a marching tune on the tuba.

description.//~: ol' is an informal short-form for old, and here is part of big-ol as large-and-cumbersome.
description.str: A big ol' tuba.  Much easier to play when you're wearing it.  Thankfully, this one has a harness attached.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on the saxophone.
You play a soulful jazz piece on the sax.
You play a quick, energetic ditty on the sax.
npc_descriptions: play a little tune on the saxophone.
play a soulful jazz piece on the sax.
play a quick, energetic ditty on the sax.

description: A brass alto saxophone with a neck strap, so you can wear it while playing.
